display_long_description:
A revolutionary block-breaking game that rotates a bar like never before
Free, simple, and fun, you can play it in your spare time and it's addictive

Play this brain-training block-breaking game with a new sensation and unique visual design in four modes: Normal, Speed, Chaos, and Max

Normal: Easiest
Speed: Fast ball speed
Chaos: Blocks life game
Max: Speed ​​& Chaos

Aim for the top of the high score rankings overall or for each mode

Aim for the block in the center and hit the ball
Eliminate blocks in succession to get a high score
Test your reflexes and sense of balance...

[How to play]
Flick left or right to rotate the blocks left or right
When waiting for input, use one touch or one click
Hit the ball at the block in the center of the screen to clear it.

Clearing multiple blocks in succession will earn you a high score.
Clearing all blocks will clear the stage.

Modes: Normal, Speed, Chaos, Max, in that order, give you high scores.
As you progress through the stage, the number of blocks will change and the ball speed will increase.

Copyright 2024ｰ Nam Creations
